name: The Ashenvale Hunt
tooltip:
The Ashenvale Hunt

There are three legendary creatures that make up the Ashenvale Hunt; you may seek them and test yourself against their cunning and might.  In the process, you will hopefully learn something about yourself.  The creatures are: the bear Ursangous, the nightsaber cat Shadumbra, and the hippogryph Sharptalon.

The creatures of the Ashenvale Hunt are powerful, and you may find that you'll need aid in bringing them down.  If you should best them, bring me proof of your deed.
